sentences.en: " I doubt that, " he said and his face went suddenly quiet and somber.
sentences.cn: " 我怀疑这一点, " 他说这话时脸色突然显得平静而阴沉了.

sentences.en: A funeral is a somber occasion.
A sad and somber funeral with the body still breathing.
sentences.cn: 一场悲伤的,阴暗的葬礼,虽然这个身体还有呼吸.

sentences.en: Are you in character somber, melancholy, or neglectful?
sentences.cn: 你生性阴沉 、 忧郁, 或是不修边幅 吗 ?

sentences.en: Behind this real feeling there was something still more meaningful and somber.
sentences.cn: 除了这种真挚的感情外,还有着某种更有意义、更为阴暗的东西.

sentences.en: Don't ignore it because it makes you laugh — director Paul Feig's 2011 hit deserves as much respect as any somber, wintry, subtitled drama.
sentences.cn: 不要因为它让你开怀大笑而忽略了它——总监保罗·法伊格在2011年引起的这场轩然大波与其他任何忧郁、寒冷、次要的戏剧一样值得尊重。

sentences.en: He had a somber expression on his face.
He was very somber and did not want to offer any comment.
sentences.cn: 记者见到柯有伦的时候,柯有伦面色沉重,不愿发表任何意见.

sentences.en: Her 71-year-old husband, looking somber and composed, was brought into the church in a wheelchair and did not speak at the service.
sentences.cn: 凯西71岁高龄的丈夫被人用轮椅推进教堂，看起来沉默忧郁，在葬礼仪式上也没有发言。

sentences.en: His coat was a somber brown.
His expression was somber as he listened to the report of the accident.
sentences.cn: 他听着关于事故的报告时,脸部表情严峻.

sentences.en: His eyes were somber, resentful and yet nervous.
sentences.cn: 他的眼睛显得阴沉 、 愤懑,然而又惶惶不安.

sentences.en: In the somber archives of a sedate museum a large archaic volume is somewhat conspicuously displayed.
sentences.cn: 在一个平静的博物馆中昏暗的档案室里，一本厚厚的古书被摆在了很显著的位置。

sentences.en: It had been dull and somber enough.
sentences.cn: 那是十分愁闷的,十分忧郁的.

sentences.en: It is somber there, they say there are evil monsters there.
sentences.cn: 那里阴森森的, 道士说有妖气.

sentences.en: Life, however dark and somber, could never apparently cloud his soul.
sentences.cn: 人生无论如何黑暗阴沉, 显然决不会使他的灵魂蒙上阴影.

sentences.en: She hold her head up and stared at the somber December sky.
sentences.cn: 她抬起头来,凝望着十二月份阴沉沉的天空.

sentences.en: She was dressed in somber black.
